title: SolrTestCaseJ4.adoc(SolrInputDocument sdoc) doesn't properly serialize dates when creating the XML
description: SolrTestCaseJ4.adoc(SolrInputDocument sdoc) doesn't properly serialize dates when creating the document XML. The serialization should be handled in the same fashion as solrj.util.ClientUtils.toXML(SolrInputDocument doc).

comments.author: Shalin Shekhar Mangar
comments.content: Fixed in 4.x and trunk as part of SOLR-3988 commit.
